name: DJMAX Portable 3
description:
The sequel to the music sensation comes to the PSP® system

Come test your coordination and skill in the sequel to the game that started the ultimate music game craze! As the master DJ, mix your way through over 40 unique tracks and take on the all new Mission mode filled with tons of new challenges and styles. With tons of unlockables and hidden features, DJMAX PORTABLE 3 will keep you playing endlessly.

2010 PM Studios, Inc. and the PM Studios, Inc. logo are trademarks of PM Studios, Inc. DJMAX Portable 3 is a trademark of Pentavision Entertainment. All rights reserved. All other trademarks and copyrights are properties of their respective owners.
